display_long_description:
Forget traditional controllers—no buttons, no joysticks, no teleportation. In this immersive experience, you’ll use your body to run, climb, and jump. Push off surfaces to leap, and grip them with both hands to scale walls and trees.

Choose from four thrilling game modes:

Tag: A simple, fast-paced game for up to 3 players.

Infection: One player becomes "it," and everyone else must avoid being tagged.

The Hunt: A personal mission where you chase down your target.

Paintbrawl: A colorful, team-based paintball battle using slingshots.

You can race against other gorillas, parkour up cliff faces and treetops to dodge your pursuers, or become the hunter yourself. Whether you're playing with strangers in the jungle or hosting a private session with friends, the low-stakes environment lets you relax, socialize, and even make your own custom games. The movement system is intuitive but challenging to master, keeping things fun and exciting.

Explore six different dynamic levels, each with unique terrain and obstacles that create endless possibilities for play.

The City store offers a rotating inventory of gear and items to express your inner monke. Customize your look with new outfits, accessories, and tools, all available for purchase.

This is your chance to become Gorilla.

Let the jungle become your playground.
